amendment.description: Amendment, as modified pursuant to the rule, applies liability rules applicable to product sellers to persons engaged in the business of renting or leasing products, but exempts them from liability for customer's illegal misuse of such a product.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to apply Section 103 (liability rules applicable to product sellers) to persons engaged in the business of renting or leasing products, but exempt them from liability for a customer's illegal misuse of such a product.

action.text: Geren amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Pursuant to H. Res. 109, the amendment is considered in a modified form.
On agreeing to the Geren amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
